Create User API Endpoint

This endpoint allows you to create a new user in the system.

On this page

  • Endpoint
  • Parameters
  • Response
  • Examples

Endpoint

POST /api/users

Parameters

Field Type Required
name string Yes
email string Yes

Response

{
  "id": 123,
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com"
}

Examples

fetch('/api/users', {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
  body: JSON.stringify({
    name: 'John Doe',
    email: 'john@example.com'
  })
})
